mapper.update: update t_reply set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select r.id,r.content,r.create_time,u.headshot, u.id uid, u.username,p.title,p.id pid from t_reply r left join t_post p on p.id = r.post_id left join t_user u on u.id = r.user_id where p.id=#{id}
select r.id,r.content,r.create_time,u.headshot, u.id uid, u.username from t_reply r left join t_user u on r.user_id=u.id where r.post_id=#{postId} order by create_time desc

select r.id,r.content,r.create_time,u.headshot, u.id uid, u.username,p.title,p.id pid from t_reply r left join t_post p on p.id = r.post_id left join t_user u on u.id = r.user_id order by create_time desc
